description: Returns a list of all app authorizations configured for an app bundle.

parameters.name: appBundleIdentifier
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or Universal Unique Identifier (UUID) of the app bundle to use for the request.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of results that are returned per call. You can use nextToken to obtain further pages of results. This is only an upper limit. The actual number of results returned per call might be fewer than the specified maximum.

nested_items.name: appAuthorizationSummaryList
nested_items.description: Contains a list of app authorization summaries.

nested_items.name: appAuthorizationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the app authorization.

nested_items.name: appBundleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the app bundle for the app authorization.

nested_items.name: tenantIdentifier
nested_items.description: The ID of the application tenant.

nested_items.name: tenantDisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the tenant.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The state of the app authorization.
PendingConnect: The initial state of the app authorization. The app authorization is created but not yet connected.
Connected: The app authorization is connected to the application, and is ready to be used.

ConnectionValidationFailed: The app authorization received a validation exception when trying to connect to the application. If the app authorization is in this state, you should verify the configured credentials and try to connect the app authorization again.
TokenAutoRotationFailed: AppFabric failed to refresh the access token. If the app authorization is in this state, you should try to reconnect the app authorization.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: Timestamp for when the app authorization was last updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If nextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Make the call again using the returned token to retrieve the next page. Keep all other arguments unchanged. Each pagination token expires after 24 hours. Using an expired pagination token will return an HTTP 400 InvalidToken error.
